      • startOpening

        public void startOpening(DoorOpeningCallback callback)
        Start door opening.

        NOTE: Should only be called once the DoorProvider.initialize(Callback) and DoorProvider.register(Callback) already took place.

        Specified by:
        startOpening in interface DoorProvider
        Parameters:
        callback - callback to receive door opening result.

      • stopOpening

        public void stopOpening()
        Stop door opening if it was previously started.

        NOTE: Should only be called once the DoorProvider.initialize(Callback) and DoorProvider.register(Callback) already took place.

        NOTE: Hafele SDK doesn't support canceling door opening operation, thus this method won't do anything.

        Specified by:
        stopOpening in interface DoorProvider

      • getVendor

        public CNIMobileKeyProvider getVendor()
        Return door provider's vendor.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        CNIMobileKeyProvider of a provider.

      • register

        public void register(Callback callback)
        Register a device in doorlock vendor's cloud.

        NOTE: It's safe to call this method multiple times for the same user - if the device has already been registered then this method won't do anything. This method should be called only the provider has been successfully initialized (DoorProvider.initialize(Callback)).

        Specified by:
        register in interface DoorProvider
        Parameters:
        callback - callback to receive the registration result.

      • sync

        public void sync(Callback callback)
        Synchronize mobile keys and metadata between a device and doorlock vendor's cloud.

        NOTE: Should only be called once the DoorProvider.initialize(Callback) and DoorProvider.register(Callback) already took place.
        Specified by:
        sync in interface DoorProvider
        Parameters:
        callback - callback to receive the synchronization result.

      • hasMobileKey

        public void hasMobileKey(ResultCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
        Check if there's a mobile key available.

        NOTE: Should only be called once the DoorProvider.initialize(Callback) and DoorProvider.register(Callback) already took place.
        Specified by:
        hasMobileKey in interface DoorProvider
        Parameters:
        callback - callback to receive the synchronization result.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Deactivate available mobile keys and clear cache related to a current user. Normally, this should be done only when a user logged out or his user-session expired.

        NOTE: after DoorProvider.destroy() has successfully took place a device registration process (DoorProvider.register(Callback)) has to be done once again in order have mobile key functionality working.

        Specified by:
        destroy in interface DoorProvider

      • processKeyData

        public void processKeyData(android.os.Bundle data)
        Process push notification data received from a vendor's cloud.
        Specified by:
        processKeyData in interface DoorProvider
        Specified by:
        processKeyData in interface MobileKeyDataProcessor
        Parameters:
        data - the data received in push notification.
